title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; chat, generate, create, push, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async APIs, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, create and delete models from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with ergonomic commands and TUI model picker.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, generate, embeddings).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C# / .NET client library for Ollama with async streaming and model management.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community repo with Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open WebUI, GPU support, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds local AI assist for summarizing notes, brainstorming and Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull and manage models from Go applications.
